ingredient.detailed_description: Bentonite clay, also known as Montmorillonite clay, is a naturally occurring material that is composed primarily of montmorillonite, a type of mineral made from volcanic ash. It is highly absorbent and has a unique ability to produce an "electrical charge" when hydrated. Upon contact with fluid, its electrical components change, giving it the ability to absorb toxins. Bentonite is used in a variety of applications, including skincare, haircare, and detoxification.
